page.title: 04Transport Class 7
page.content: Lacking industry, Staining people must travel for work and some schools. We surveyed 116 school families. 16 had 3 members;68, 4;21, 5 96 had cars;66, 1 car;30, 2 109 had bikes;20, 1 bike;44, 2;29, 3 13, 4 14 had motorbikes; 13 had lorries/vans 99 had working fathers: 36 worked within 3 miles of home; 68 within 10 63 had working mothers: 41 within 3 mls 61 within 10 31 fathers and 2 mothers travel >10 mls 15 families used bus daily; 14 weekly 33 never used the bus; 62 never railway 222 went to school; 96 walked; 69 by car; 37 bussed; 20 cycled All younger children surveyed attended Staining School 68 families used countryside footpaths sometimes; 27, often; 21, never
